body_html:
In that case it tells me

initialize_local_variables (from tensorflow.python.ops.variables) is deprecated and will be removed after 2017-03-02.

And then breaks the same way it broke before.

sess.run(tf.initialize_local_variables())
sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())
#sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer(), feed_dict={is_training: False}) # this works instead of above
body_text:
In that case it tells me
initialize_local_variables (from tensorflow.python.ops.variables) is deprecated and will be removed after 2017-03-02.

And then breaks the same way it broke before.
sess.run(tf.initialize_local_variables())
sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())
#sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer(), feed_dict={is_training: False}) # this works instead of above
body:
In that case it tells me 

```
initialize_local_variables (from tensorflow.python.ops.variables) is deprecated and will be removed after 2017-03-02.
```

And then breaks the same way it broke before.

```
sess.run(tf.initialize_local_variables())
sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())
#sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer(), feed_dict={is_training: False}) # this works instead of above
```
